title: Words & Kisses
description:
Description :
        I wasn't interested in dating... until I met her.
Just as I was about to get into another ambiguous, half-hearted relationship, I met her. Hyunjin Go, I couldn't take my eyes off her. I had been treading a dull path, and she knocked me right off. Then I felt it- a little piece of my heart, breaking off and slipping away. "She's so pretty..."
